channel.title: How do u rename portals?
channel.description:
hi, mochronik here XD
simple question how do i rename a portal for example if its name is "portal" and u wanna name it "anything"
AND btw how do you add dialogue to a portal : example when u click on portal it would give you dialogue options like "kbd" "train" ?
i really need these two things ive tried and just need a few hints or a tutorial :)
greatly appreciate it.

i honestly don’t know why im not getting this :
its a [DELTA] base btw [br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 21, 2009, 08:47:43 pm[/size][hr]BUMB i need a link or steps please.

item.title: How do u rename portals?
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Put it in the portal’s case.

As far as ID’s, I have:
140 - Select an Option
148 - Select an Option
228 - Two options (chat)
314 - Select an option
554 - Select an option

To test those, I would use my interface testing command:

if(command.startsWith("interface") && command.length() > 9) { int interfaceid = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(10)); sendFrame164(interfaceid); }

Read full topic

sendQuest(" ", line);

im a decent coder but i just need to know where to enter that ? im thinking client.java ? and what would the interface ID be? I’d love you forever if u had the ID lol
